mapper.select: SELECT AA.RGS_DT rgsDt, AA.EMP_NM rcmdEmpNm, BB.EMP_NM rgsEmpNm, AA.COWK_DESC cowkDesc, AA.COWK_PFMS cowkPfms, AA.IMPRS_PNT imprsPnt FROM (SELECT A.*, B.EMP_NM FROM COWK_RCMD A, EMP_INFO B WHERE A.RCMD_EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO) AA , (SELECT A.*, B.EMP_NM FROM COWK_RCMD A, EMP_INFO B WHERE A.RGS_EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO) BB WHERE AA.RCMD_EMP_NO = BB.RCMD_EMP_NO ORDER BY AA.RGS_DTTM DESC
